title: Desecrating Solomon
description: On the seventh day of the seventh yearâ€¦ she desecrates.Evil keeps a formidable schedule in Weston, West Virginia. Every seventh year, spirits from the town's abandoned insane asylum seek worthy souls to command. But this seventh year, a desecration unlike any before is scheduled to ravage the town. And Solomon Gorge is lured to the harrowing event by the screams of Silence.
author: Lucian Bane
